story.title: Title: Event schedule for open day visitors

scenario.title: Title: Event schedule for open day visitors Narrative: As an open day visitor I want to view the upcoming event times So that I do not miss any events that I want to attend. Scenario 1: Mobile user
scenario.step: Given as an open day visitorjava.lang.NullPointerException
Given that I am on the mobile app
When I tap on the "Whats's On" button
Then the "Event list" is displayed Scenario 2: Desktop User
Given that I am on the "Virtual Open Day" page of the desktop website
When I click on the "Full Event Schedule" button
